key_risks: Regulatory scrutiny related to tax refund-related financial products
Dependence on fintech partnerships for Banking-as-a-Service (BaaS) operations
Competitive pressure from traditional banks and emerging fintech companies
Reputation risks due to high fees and lack of transparency in prepaid card industry
controversies: Scrutiny of fees and practices in tax refund-related financial products
Consumer complaints about prepaid card functionality and transparency
social_issues: Financial inclusion efforts through prepaid card programs and tax-related financial products
Consumer dissatisfaction with prepaid card functionality
governance_issues: Compliance challenges with federal and state regulations, including FDIC, CFPB, and IRS
